snippet.title: Dark and Light - Closed Beta Sign-Up Now Open
snippet.description:
Dark and Light is a new fantasy-themed online sandbox RPG from Snail Games, set to release on Steam in Early Access in 2017.

Sign up for a chance to enter our first closed beta test here: https://zh.surveymonkey.com/r/DNLtestsurvey

Visit the official Dark and Light Website: http://www.playdnl.com/

Like Dark and Light on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialDNL/

Follow Dark and Light on Twitter: https://twitter.com/official_DNL
